item.title: How You Make A Npc That Stands, Says If You Online, And Sells?
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.source: How You Make A Npc That Stands, Says If You Online, And Sells?

item.title: How You Make A Npc That Stands, Says If You Online, And Sells?
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

ok first off if u got textpad go to you autospawn.cfg in textpad

you should see this…END OF AUTOSPAWN
after that line type in

spawn = (npc id) then tab (coords) tab (coords) tab 0 tab 0 tab 0 tab 0 tab 0 then a despirction for it

to find coords hit f4

to make them talk… go into your npchandler.java (the notepad 1)

search for moo

at the end of that u should see a } hit enter after that and post this is there

[code]if (npcs[i].npcType == npc id here) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Name here”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner (name here) is ONLINE”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner (name here) is OFFLINE”;
}
}
}

u can change where it says npc id here to the npcs id u chose in autospawn and u have to put your full name in that…player is on thingy and then put your name under that

hope i could help :)[/code]

Read full topic
